infos.value: It must have been evoked from an ancient relic...
But why would Lord Sadali send Sterne here...?
Perhaps His Holiness is uneasy that we are unaccompanied at the castle.
Hourne's first division, «Solidus», will be upon us at any moment. It should be quite the battle.
You will be participating as well, of course.
Hourne...? That is no concern of mine.
You bastard... You dare defy Lord Sadali?
Go rest in your quarters if it will help you stay out of our way.
The credit for victory will belong to us alone. That's the only change to the plan, right?
...So that's your intent. If it plays out that way, it's not a bad idea.
